title: Provided further that augmentation of area of CD shall not be allowed after further CC has been issued in respect of more than 75% of the total permissible BUA sanctioned under the original Scheme and there shall be no revision of individual areas as a result of such amalgamation of area
clause_text: Provided further that augmentation of area of CD shall not be allowed after further CC has been issued in respect of more than 75% of the total permissible BUA sanctioned under the original Scheme and there shall be no revision of individual areas as a result of such amalgamation of area. However, deletion of area from a sanctioned scheme will be permissible, provided the construction of rehabilitation component has not commenced and such deletion does not break the contiguity of the area under CDS.
